questions.question: What is the primary use of GitHub for a Flutter course?
options: B) To share and collaborate on code
C) To manage dependencies and versions

questions.question: Which interface is used to install Flutter?

Why might you need to edit system environment variables if Flutter is not installed correctly?

options: A) To learn from others' code
C) To get hands-on experience with Flutter

questions.question: Which best practice is to keep your code organized and up-to-date?
options: A) Using a version control system (VCS)

questions.question: What is the purpose of writing unit tests in web development?
options: B) To test the entire application

questions.question: Why is it important to use a consistent coding style?
options: C) To make code more readable and maintainable

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of using a Content Delivery Network (CDN)?
Why is it important to use secure protocols when transmitting data over the web?
